#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
char clr[][10] = { "black", "brown", "red", "orange", "yellow", "green", "blue", "violet", "grey", "white" };
int calls(char *str)
  {
      for(int i=0;i<11;i++)
      {
              if(strcmp(str,clr[i])==0)
              return i;
              }}
int main()
{   
    char f1[4][10];
    cin>>f1[0]>>f1[1]>>f1[2]>>f1[3];
    long long int ans=0;
    for(int i=0;i<4;i++)
    ans=ans*16+calls(f1[i]);
    
    cout<<ans;
    for(int i=0;i<calls(f1[3]);i++)
    cout<<"0";
    cout<<" Guntur";
    return 0;}
